articles.title: Highly mutated COVID variant BA.2.86 detected in 2 more countries, but 'pandemic in a different phase’, says WHO | Mint - Mint

articles.content: A highly mutated COVID variant named BA.2.86 has been identified in Switzerland and South Africa, along with Israel, Denmark, the US, and the UK, according to a leading official from the World Health… [+3614 chars]

articles.content: NEW DELHI : Leaders of Brics countries on Thursday invited six more nations to join them in the groupings first expansion since 2010. Iran, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Argentina, Ethiopia and the United Ara… [+3042 chars]
